title: Supreme Court Allows Trump’s Transgender Military Ban
itunes:title: Supreme Court Allows Trump’s Transgender Military Ban
description:
Bloomberg News Supreme Court Reporter Greg Stohr discusses how a

divided U.S. Supreme Court cleared President Donald Trump’s administration to start barring most transgender people from serving in the armed forces. He speaks to Bloomberg’s June Grasso.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
